text: The Cupra Tavascan is an electric concept SUV produced by the Spanish manufacturer SEAT under the Cupra brand. It was unveiled on 4 September 2019 at 2019 Frankfurt Motor Show. == Technical characteristics == Cupra Tavascan The Tavascan is based on the MEB platform designed for electric vehicles of the Volkswagen Group, of which the Volkswagen ID.3 is the first production vehicle to use it. The SUV receives two electric motors, placed on the axles, allowing to obtain an all-wheel drive and providing a cumulative power of . The Tavascan's battery has a capacity of providing a range of . ==References== Formentor Category:Cars introduced in 2019
title: Cupra Tavascan
